version_description:
NEW
- New card style appearance for player view
- Player can now be dismissed by tapping an indicator
- Long press the download button on a collection to delete any downloaded books in that collection
- Books can now be sorted by “User Rating” (i.e. audible rating) and “My Rating”

IMPROVED
- Book view is automatically dismissed after play button is tapped
- Books within a collection are now sorted by release year by default

FIXED
- Fixed an issue where bluetooth pause gesture would not register when playback speed is above 1x
- Fixed an issue where swiping left on a book would show an option to download it, even when the book has already been downloaded
- Fixed an issue where initiating a download then returning to the book view wouldn’t show download progress

Thanks for all the amazing feedback so far! If you’re enjoying Prologue, please consider leaving a review.

NEW
- Voice boost: equalizes voices and boosts volume in loud environnments
- Progress bar is now displayed on collections
- Individual chapters of a book can now be downloaded by swiping

IMPROVED
- Books can now be downloaded on cellular:
- When initialising a download while cellular is active, the download button will change to the wifi symbol
- Tap the button again to start the download
- If a download is initiated while WiFi is active, the download will automatically pause when switching to cellular.
- When a specific chapter is selected to play, an option is given to update progress of the book up to that point
- Chapter titles can now span 2 lines
- Playback indicator no longer animates if playback is paused
- Playback indicator is no longer displayed on bookmarked, recent, downloaded sections of suggested tab
- Show up to 20 search results (up from 10)
- You can now show all search results by tapping the “Show all results” button

FIXED
- Fixed issue where books within a collection were sorted newest first (my bad)
- Fixed Plex libraries not displaying in some situations
- Library status indicator on suggested tab now correctly turns red when unable to connect to Plex server
- Fixed search bar text colour on iOS beta versions
- Fixed a crash on launch when running the latest iOS beta version
- Fixed a crash when reordering chapters on the player view
- Fixed a crash when downloading
- Fixed an issue causing downloads to get “stuck”
- Fixed a few UI issues when “Show player automatically” setting is enabled

NEW
- Filter book list by Downloaded, Read or Bookmarked status. TIP: Quickly add / remove filters by long pressing filter button
- Support for Plex home users. Existing users can switch home users under Libraries -> Account -> Home Users. If no user is selected, the home administrator account is used by default.
- Relayed (indirect) connections are now supported as a last resort
- Playlist support: Plex playlists are now imported and displayed under the “Collections” tab
- Finer grained playback speed control (0.1 increments). TIP: long press button to quickly access common playback speeds.
- Automatically rewind a few seconds after audio interruptions. Can be customised under Settings -> Playback
- Remaining time & book duration is now displayed on book detail view

IMPROVED
- The app will now automatically fall back to insecure (http) connections when no secure connection can be established
- Renamed “Suggested” tab to “Home”
- Skip forward / back buttons now support skipping into next / previous chapters
- Moved app icon settings menu to root settings level
- Book titles can now span 2 lines
- Increased touch target size of player seek handle

FIXED
- Fixed an issue where book list view could display duplicate books
- Various fixes and performance improvements

If you have the time, a review or rating makes my day!

NEW
- Support for embedded m4b chapters
- Support for displaying book narrators (read from m4b composer tag)
- The app now uses a soft-delete system for missing files and libraries, similar to Plex. Items missing from the source library after a refresh will be hidden but not deleted. Clean up under Settings -> Storage.
- Support for customising image cache size under Settings -> Storage
- Playback rate can now be adjusted from CarPlay and Apple Watch now playing screens
- Option for displaying time remaining in book on CarPlay and Apple Watch now play playing screens

IMPROVED
- Improved chapter support on now playing view (skip to next / previous chapter)
- VoiceOver and accessibility improvements
- CarPlay performance and stability improvements

FIXED
- Various playback-related fixes. The app will no longer lose your place in a book after a playback error occurs.

NOTES
- The app now requires iOS 12.4+

Thank-you for the continued support. If you have the time, a review or rating makes my day!
